body.name: LASTAR LED Desk Lamp with Remote Control ＆ 32.5" Wide Double Head, Architect Desk Lamp for Home Office with Clamp, Timer, 24W Ultra Bright Gooseneck Desk lamp for Computer Reading, Black
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 19 hrs 33 mins
features: Remote Control and Touching Control: With the remote control of the lastar led desk lamp, you won't even need to leave your seat to adjust the brightness or color temperature( with a 20m remote range and remote battery ). You can also use the touch controls to get a more tactile experience. The led desk light also features a night light and 1H timer functions. Suitable for working, gaming, reading, entertainment and resting.

Various Lighting Modes: The lastar office desk lamp comes with 5 lighting modes and 5 brightness levels, allowing you to customize your lighting to suit your needs. The color temperature ranges from 3000K to 6500K, and the brightness can be adjusted from 5% to 100%. In addition, there is a one-button MAX key, which provides the brightest light for any situation.

Double Head Lamp Design: Ultra Wide dual-headed clip lamp provides a broad illumination area, its lamp bar being adjustable between 0-180°, allowing you to customize your lighting to suit your needs. This bright desk lamp for home office is very suitable for office work sewing, design, architectural drawing, painting, studying, and creating art.

Strong Eye Protection: Lastar desk light with clamp is made of aluminum alloy and ABS material, very durable. It provides uniform and wide-ranging illumination without any glare, making it perfect for eye protection and reducing eye fatigue. The computer light offers four pre-set lighting modes, Whether you're working, reading, playing games, or relaxing, just touching a button, can easily switch between the various modes.

Multi-angle adjustment： Our computer desk lamp is the perfect combination of flexibility and functionality. The flexible gooseneck design allows you to adjust the angle and provides you with the ideal lighting position. The position of the monitor desk lamp is according to your needs, and the 360° adjustable metal clamp makes it easy to attach to any surface. The lamp also supports smart plugs for added convenience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very much worth the premium
reviews.reviewText: It is not the cheapest desk lamp you will find on Amazon but it fixes all the problems I had with the cheaper options. The neck is long so the light is coming from ABOVE and not the FRONT so the light source is not in your eyes. It has all the light levels from 3000k to 6000k. It packs more than enough punch on the brightness as well. The previous models I try only meet the minimum requirement, this one goes beyond, so I don't use the brightest setting. Also it comes with a remote control which is very handy. If you pay attention to the lower price model their control is stuck to the power cable, that is very inconvenient. This one has control on top of the lamp, which is actually not the best design but it comes with a remote so that solves all problem for me. I would recommend everyone to get this model, and it is actually the lowest price model that satisfy all my feature requirement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for my desk. I like the color temperatures, good brightness and flexibility of where to shine the light. The gooseneck length is great for towering over 27” monitors. Reasonable price, nice build and the remote is great feature. The only thing I do not like is the on-unit controls-very sensitive and it seems not to control all of the features of this light. The remote is easy to use and many feature easily accessed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Overhead Light Bar!
reviews.reviewText: Great Overhead Light Bar! Easy to assemble and set-up. The instruction for pairing with the remote was weirdly written, but it was easy to figure out. Goose neck and clamp felt strong and sturdy. Head of the light shakes a bit when you shake the table, but not a deal breaker. The remote is convenient for selecting different light modes. Controls are super touch sensitive though. I accidently turned the light on/off a few time while trying to adjust it's position. Overall, it's a great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sleek and versatile but plastic
reviews.reviewText: I got it for our guest room so it will not be used a lot. I am not sure how durable it is because all components are plastic. But it looks clean and sleek and it fits perfectly on a very small desk we have there. I like how easily it can be adjusted to different brightness levels and angles. Very versatile!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Drilled our own holes to mount on wall
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this to use as a piano lamp, and didn't want something sitting on the piano, so I mounted it on the wall behind the piano. We removed the vise screw and drilled a couple holes in the back of the vise plate (through which we screwed into the wall) and it works perfectly. The light is great with the range of colors and brightnesses.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to set up and adapt to my work environment. Can easily adjust height, angle, brightness, and tone for various needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The light is much better than expected!
reviews.reviewText: It's the perfect size for my wife's art desk, and she loves the multiple settings! She says it has helped significantly with eye strain. I will be ordering another for my desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice light!
reviews.reviewText: I'm a person who basically lives at their desk. My computer monitor is over 30", so I needed a light with a tall neck. I also didn't want to be distracted by having the light in my view constantly, so I clamped it on the end of my desk and just swivel it over whenever I need more light. The different light settings are a plus, also. It's worked out perfectly for me.
Gute und stabile Lampe mit guter Lichtausleuchtung. Einfache Montage und gut zum einstellen. Gute Farbtempartur Auswahl.Klare Kaufempfehlung

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: The Mighty Lastar Desk Lamp - Your Son's Ultimate Sidekick for Adventures and Homework!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the Lastar Desk Lamp for my son, and boy, oh boy, this lamp is like having a superhero by his side! It's his ultimate sidekick for conquering adventures and tackling homework with superhero flair! 🦸‍♂️💡Let me tell you, this lamp is no ordinary lamp; it's a total powerhouse! With its 12W LED magic, it lights up his room like daylight, even in the darkest corners. And the USB charging port? It's like a secret lair for all his gadgets to power up and join the fight against darkness (and by darkness, I mean low battery levels)! 📱💪The 5 color modes are like having his very own superpowers for his room ambiance. From "Mysterious Moonlight" to "Energetic Sunshine," he can set the mood for whatever adventure he's in! And the 7 brightness levels? Perfect for defeating evil homework problems – he can adjust the light just right to vanquish them all! 🚀🌙Oh, and the 1-hour timer? It's like having an ally reminding him, "Hey, buddy, take a break from saving the world and recharge yourself!" It's super helpful in keeping him focused and energized for the next mission. Thanks, Lastar, for being his heroic timekeeper! ⏱️🤖The memory function is like having a genie granting his wishes – it remembers his favorite settings and brings them back whenever he needs them! It's pure magic – but shhh, let's keep this awesome feature a secret! 🧞🌟Best of all, the "Eye-Protecting" superpower is my son's knight in shining armor! This lamp's got his back (or, well, his eyes)! It shields him from eye strains like a true hero, ensuring he has sharp vision for all his thrilling adventures and homework quests! 👁️‍🗨️💥In conclusion, the Lastar Desk Lamp is my son's ultimate sidekick – it's fun, functional, and brings superhero vibes to his room (and his homework station)! So, if you want a lamp that's like having a superhero buddy by your son's side, this is it! Thanks, Lastar, for being his trusty partner in adventure and study time! 📚🌌P.S. I wonder if the lamp can grant wishes too... Maybe it's worth a try! 😄✨

reviews.reviewTitle: 操作スイッチの配置が重要
reviews.reviewText: PCデスクの机上面に小物が散乱しています。ディスプレイ、キーボード以外何も置いていないような方は少ないと思います。その場合、スイッチが本体根本だったり、コードの中間では、操作しづらい。これは、スイッチが頭部背面にあるので、私のゴチャゴチャデスクでは、非常に重宝しています。

reviews.reviewTitle: Sooo schön Hell für meinen Nähplatz und dunkel genug einstellbar für meinen Nachttisch
reviews.reviewText: Eine super Lampe. Hell genug für meinen Nähtisch, und so abzudunkeln, dass ich die weitere an meinem Nachttisch angeschraubt habe. Absolute Kaufempfehlung!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Early days but seems a good product for the price. Packaging was very poor and open on receipt.
reviews.reviewText: Using this as a table work light as my eyesight isn't too good.Nice to have all the dimming etc facilities.
